nodes.text: Jedi Archive: Rarely Seen Images from the Lucasfilm Archives
Jedi Archive: Rarely Seen Images from the Lucasfilm Archives was a recurring department in Star Wars Insider magazine, which debuted in Star Wars Insider 111, published in July 2009.
Star Wars Insider 111
Behind-the-scenes images of the Royal Award Ceremony scene from Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope.
Star Wars Insider 112
Rarely seen images from A New Hope of Alec Guinness as Jedi Master Obi-Wan "Ben" Kenobi.
Star Wars Insider 115
Rare images from the Lucasfilm Archives of bounty hunter Boba Fett.
Star Wars Insider 117
Behind-the-scenes images of Zam Wesell (Leeanna Walsman) from the set of Star Wars: Episode II Attack of the Clones.
Star Wars Insider 118
Behind-the-scenes images of C-3PO and his human alter ego Anthony Daniels.
Star Wars Insider 119
Behind-the-scenes images from the set of Star Wars: Episode V The Empire Strikes Back.
Star Wars Insider 120
Behind-the-scenes images of Princess Leia (Carrie Fisher) on the sets of A New Hope and Star Wars: Episode VI Return of the Jedi
Star Wars Insider 121
Behind-the-scenes images of Han Solo (Harrison Ford).
Star Wars Insider 122
Concept art and behind-the-scenes images of the Sith Lord Darth Maul (Ray Park) from Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace.
Star Wars Insider 123

This issue's segment was about Anakin Skywalker with a promotional photo of Anakin, Obi-Wan Kenobi, Qui-Gon Jinn and R2-D2 for The Phantom Menace, and three behind-the-scenes images of Anakin (Hayden Christensen), Obi-Wan (Ewan McGregor) and Padmé Amidala (Natalie Portman) from the set of Attack of the Clones.
Star Wars Insider 124
The segment in this issue showed a photograph from the Lucasfilm Archives that featured various masks used during the original trilogy of Star Wars films.
Star Wars Insider 125
This issue showed rare behind-the-scenes images of Nautolan Jedi Master Kit Fisto.
Star Wars Insider 126
Behind-the-scenes images of Princess Leia, disguised as the bounty hunter Boushh, during her attempt to rescue Han Solo at Jabba the Hutt's Palace.
Star Wars Insider 127
Concept art and images of Jabba the Hutt from Return of the Jedi and a Japanese advertising campaign.
Star Wars Insider 128
Behind-the-scenes images of General Grievous and his final confrontation with Obi-Wan Kenobi on Utapau from Star Wars: Episode III Revenge of the Sith.
Star Wars Insider 129
Lucasfilm Archives' images from the Revenge of the Sith set, which showed actor Wayne Pygram's makeup transformation into Wilhuff Tarkin, previously portrayed by Peter Cushing.
Star Wars Insider Special Edition 2012
The first segment showed behind-the-scenes images of George Lucas on the set of A New Hope. The second segment displayed concept arts and images of the Jedi High Council from The Phantom Menace.
